A partner for your growth Helping you grow is our main goal and passion. Tripod Link‚Äôs team of human resource management experts will help you attract and select the strongest talents in the market and adapt the best methods and HR solutions for sustainable growth. For employers Employee search and selection. Employee and candidate assessment. For candidates All our job postings in one place. For employers Employee search and selection. Employee and candidate assessment. For candidates All our job postings in one place. Services For employers Recruitment Services In case you want to strengthen your team for change or growth get in touch with us. We will help you find, evaluate, and hire the strongest talents in the market. We pay special attention to the formulation of your employer value proposition (EVP) and apply only reliable methods that are backed by research and data. For employers Assessment If you want to assess your own candidates or current employees for promotion or other reasons, we will select the most appropriate tools depending on your needs. The psychometric tools we use are standardized for Latvia. For employers Organisational Surveys Many of our clients are already using the help of our HR consultants in implementing performance review systems, shaping employer brand, creating employee recruitment process, or improving other parts of employee journey. Feel free to ask for advice ‚Äì the first evaluation (audit) of your current situation is free of charge. For candidates Job Listings Our clients are TOP employers. Here you will find information on all of our current vacancies by the industry: IT, Finance, Sales, Marketing, Engineering and other. If your dream job post is not there, feel free to write to us at info@tripodlink.lv or subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to receive the latest job offers. We base the sustainability of our partnership on professionalism Why choose us? One team covering the best practice in the pan-Baltic market: We are the first HR solutions firm, uniting the best of the Baltic States employment market. Our team covers the full scope of recruitment, organizational research, consultancy and assessment services. We are your one-stop-shop for needed HR solutions no matter in which market ‚Äì Lithuania, Latvia or Estonia ‚Äì you need help. Our united teams have proven long-standing experience in the market: 13+ years in Lithuania and 25+ years in Estonia, which use only scientifically validated methodologies in our work, tailored for each client. For you, it means guaranteed accumulated expertise, knowledge about the local market pulse and best HR practices while reaching your goals. Proven track record for your business success We are experts in recruitment and HR, but also specialize in different industries and job functions. We have technology, IT, finance and management, and business development recruitment teams. Every year we successfully perform over 600 of the most complex searches, more than 100 coaching customers and 30 000 tests a year in the Baltics market. It‚Äòs not all about the quantity. Quality is our main goal. We have a 95 % success rate of recruited candidates remaining successfully working in the companies. Exclusive attention to your image and growth We pay a lot of attention to efficiency and risk management and deliver all our services on the time. The experience we create for candidates has a direct impact on how candidates perceive you as an employer. We guarantee that we will use all our accumulated experience and reputation to strengthen your image in the market. More about us Contact Us +371 279 98 661 info@tripodlink.lv Dzirnavu iela 67, Rƒ´ga, LV-1011 About Us About Tripod Link Team Social responsibility Useful links For employers For candidates Privacy policy Cookies are used ¬© 2025 TRIPOD, SIA Created by Interested in new career opportunities? Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about the latest job offers. About Us
 ‚Äì El Pinto Co-Packing Skip to content Home About Us Shop Shop All Products Gift Packs SALSA SCORPION CHILE SAUCES HOT SAUCE DRINK MIXERS Certifications Services Contact Us Careers Fiesta Salsa Limited Edition Log in Facebook Instagram Home About Us Shop All Products Gift Packs SALSA SCORPION CHILE SAUCES HOT SAUCE DRINK MIXERS Certifications Services Contact Us Careers Fiesta Salsa Limited Edition Search Log in Cart Item added to your cart View cart Check out Continue shopping ABOUT EL PINTO CO-PACKING EL PINTO HISTORY, FAMILY AND THE ‚ÄúSALSA TWINS‚Äù Jack and Connie Thomas built El Pinto Restaurant in 1962. Their dream was to serve the recipes of Connie‚Äôs mother Josephina Chavez-Griggs. They decided to name the restaurant El Pinto meaning ‚Äúthe spot‚Äù. It started as a one room restaurant with just a handful of tables and a small kitchen. They built their home nearby so they could raise their family and be close to their business. Family has always been the heart and soul of El Pinto. The Thomas‚Äô six children all helped in the restaurant while they were growing up. It became a destination restaurant where families traveled for miles to enjoy the delicious food and the beautiful north valley of Albuquerque. ‚ÄúThe Salsa Twins‚Äù, Jim and John Thomas, purchased the restaurant and expanded with more patios and a spectacular indoor garden room containing many live plants and a waterfall. The restaurant now seats over 1,200 guests in our five pet friendly patios, five indoor dining rooms, and cantina. On any given weekend there may be a wedding, corporate team building event, a movie that is filming, and friends and family enjoying a dinner out under the cottonwoods. The patios are enclosed during the winter months so guests can still enjoy the patio and sit near a warm fire. El Pinto is one of the largest restaurants in the Southwest and is located on the original Route 66 and adjacent to the historic Rio Grande River. The salsas and sauces served in the restaurant were so popular that customers asked to take them home. The Twins worked day and night to perfect the process of bottling the restaurant products, beginning with a 35-gallon kettle in the kitchen. Today, El Pinto uses 120 tons of chiles a year, can make over 12,000 cases a day and has the capacity to make 20 million jars a year in their 35,000 square foot manufacturing and storage facility. The quality of El Pinto products begins with the chile. To Jim and John, quality is of the utmost importance. Similar to a fine wine, chile needs to be grown and nurtured in the right environment to embody the best flavor of the chile. In keeping with Josephina‚Äôs recipes all chiles used in the El Pinto products are grown exclusively in the famous Hatch Valley of New Mexico. We partner with only the finest growers and work with them to select the best produce for our products. 

The authentic flavor and hand-picked ingredients used in El Pinto Salsa makes the product versatile for both snacking and cooking. El Pinto‚Äôs Salsa and Green Chile Sauce can be used to spice up everyday dishes such as Green Chile Meatloaf and Green Chile Chicken Stew.

El Pinto products are now available nationwide in stores including Wal-Mart, Kroger, and Albertson‚Äôs. El Pinto Foods Our own salsa, at first, was created and filled in our small kitchen. We now have our product in some of the largest retail stores like Walmart &  Krogers. Through the years of experience we‚Äôve figure out how to maintain product integrity and consistency. We‚Äôve been through both the ups & down of the food co-packing process. Our experience, a 45,000 sq. foot facility with automation, and a team of knowledgable staff is what we offer all our co-packing clients. We look forward in helping you navigate through the co-packing process and helping your product get the attention, quality, and consistency it deserves. Let's get started REQUEST INFORMATION Our manufacturing process starts with our R&D team, which will evaluate your existing recipe for production on our processing and packaging equipment. Contact LOV3 Houston - Get in Touch with Our Premier Lounge LOV3 HOUSTON Menu Weekly Signatures Private Events Gallery Learn About LOV3 Frequently Asked Questions Reservations Reservations Get in touch We at LOV3 Houston are always eager to hear from you. Whether you have feedback, need support, or have general inquiries, our team is here to assist. While we encourage event bookings through our dedicated events page, this contact form is your direct line to our staff for all other queries. Get in Touch Immediately For immediate assistance or specific inquiries, please use the contact details below. Our team is available to ensure your experience with us is seamless and enjoyable. General Inquiries For feedback, support requests, or general questions, please use the form below. We strive to respond promptly and appropriately to each inquiry. For event bookings, kindly visit our Events page for a more tailored experience. First Name Last Name Phone Email Message Thank you! Your submission has been received! Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form. FAQ GENERAL INFORMATION What are the club's operating hours? Our operating hours vary by night and event. Please check our website or contact us for the most up-to-date information on our hours of operation. Is there parking available at the club? Yes, we offer valet parking for our guests. There are also nearby parking lots available. Is there a smoking area available? √Ç Yes, we have designated smoking areas within the club. Can I bring my own bottle to the club? No, outside bottles and beverages are not allowed. All bottles must be purchased through our bottle service. Can I leave and re-enter the club? Re-entry policies vary depending on the event and club policies. Please check with the staff upon arrival for specific re-entry information. How can I join the guest list for an event? You can join the guest list for specific events by signing up on our website or by contacting our reservations team. RESERVATION ESSENTIALS How do I make a reservation? We recommend booking online through our website www.LOV3Htx.com or by contacting our reservations team via phone (346) 833-6892 What time should I arrive for my reservation? It's recommended to arrive at least 15 minutes before your reservation time to ensure a smooth entry. How does seating duration limits work? Seating duration for reservations are set during booking to accommodate peak periods. While we try to extend seat times, when possible, we may need to relocate parties during busy times. However, guests are not required to leave the venue if their seating time ends. They are welcome to stay and enjoy other areas of the venue. Can I extend my table reservation? Extensions may be possible depending on availability. Please speak with your hostess to arrange this. RESERVATION SERVICE & REQUIREMENTS What is included with my bottle service reservation? Bottle service includes a reserved table for the evening, a selection of bottles, mixers, a dedicated server, and VIP entry. Wristbands are provided and limited to the number of guests the table accommodates. Additional wristbands are available for purchase. √¢¬Ä¬ç Do you offer shisha with bottle service? Shisha is available upon request. Please confirm its availability when making your reservation. How does the minimum spend work? √Ç The minimum spend refers to the amount you are required to spend on bottles and mixers during your reservation. For example, if the minimum spend is $1,000, this amount must be allocated to bottles and mixers only. Food, hookah, and other beverages do not count toward the minimum spend requirement. Is gratuity included in the bottle service? Yes, gratuity and taxes are typically included in the cost of the bottle service. What happens if I don't meet the minimum spend? If the minimum spend is not met, the remaining balance will be charged as a fee. Are there any additional fees I should be aware of? The minimum spend covers your bottles and services, but additional purchases and gratuity may apply. All applicable taxes and service charges will be included in your final bill. What forms of payment are accepted? We accept all major credit cards and cash payments. Do you offer any discounts for early bookings or special promotions? Occasionally, we offer special promotions and discounts for early bookings. Check our website or contact our reservations team for current offers. √¢¬Ä¬ç RESERVATION ADD ONS Can I pre-order specific bottles? Yes, pre-ordering is available and recommended to ensure your preferred selection is in stock. √¢¬Ä¬ç Can I customize my bottle selection? Yes, you can choose from a variety of bottles available on our menu. Custom packages and upgrades can also be arranged in advance during booking. Can I request a specific table location in the club? Table locations are subject to availability. While we will do our best to accommodate your preferences, specific table assignments cannot be guaranteed. Do you offer any special packages for birthdays or celebrations? Yes, we offer customizable packages for special occasions. Guests can select birthday upgrades online to access birthday party specials. Contact our reservations team for more details. What if I have a special request or need for my booking? We strive to accommodate all special requests. Please inform our reservations team of any specific needs or preferences when making your booking. Can I modify my reservation after it has been made? Yes, you can modify your reservation up to 48 hours in advance using the booking link provided in your confirmation email. For any changes made less than 48 hours before your reservation, please call or text our reservations team directly to discuss your options. √¢¬Ä¬ç Can I order additional bottles during the night? Yes, you can order additional bottles and mixers throughout the night. VIP√Ç¬†BOOKING DETAILS Are there any additional perks with VIP reservations? VIP reservations include expedited entry, a dedicated service team and a secure area monitored by security staff. Is there a waitlist if VIP tables are fully booked? Yes, we do maintain a waitlist. If your preferred table is not available, we will notify you if there is a cancellation or if a table becomes available. Is a deposit required for booking a VIP table? √Ç Yes, a deposit is required to secure dinner reservations for parties of 7 or more. This deposit will be applied to your final check. For late-night reservations, a section fee is required; however, section fees are not applied toward bottle service minimums. Please note that deposits and section fees are non-refundable, non-transferable, and cannot be used for a future reservation if you need to cancel. What is the spend minimum required for a VIP√Ç¬†Table Booking? The minimum spend varies depending on the night, event, and table location. It typically ranges from $500 to $2,000. Is there a limit to the number of guests per VIP table? Each table has a maximum guest limit. Larger groups may need to book multiple tables. If parties exceed maximum limits, seating may not be available for all guests. Are there any age restrictions for VIP table bookings? We are a 21+ environment. All guests must be at least 21 years to enter at all times. What is the dress code for VIP areas? The dress code is fashionable and upscale. What is the cancellation policy for VIP table bookings? For Dinner & Brunch reservations, we kindly request that cancellations be made at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to your reservation, or no-shows, will incur a non-refundable cancellation fee of $25 per person. For Large Party reservations during dinner or brunch hours, cancellations must also be made at least 24 hours in advance. Please note that deposits are non-refundable, non-transferable, and cannot be applied to a future reservation. For Late-Night reservations, cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance. The section fee is non-refundable, non-transferable, and cannot be used for future bookings. √¢¬Ä¬ç What is the policy for no-shows? If you do not show up for your reservation, you will be charged a $25 per person non-refundable cancellation fee. For both large party and late-night reservations, no-shows will result in the forfeiture of the deposit or section fee. PRIVATE EVENTS Can I make a reservation for a large party or corporate event? Yes, LOV3 Houston can accommodate large parties and corporate events. Please contact our event planning team for more details and to make arrangements. LOV3 HOUSTON LOV3 HOURS OF OPERATION √¢¬Ä¬ç MON: CLOSED TUE - THU:√Ç¬†6PM - 12AM FRI - SAT: 6PM - 2AM SUNDAY: 12PM - 8PM RESERVED FOR GUESTS AGED 21+ STREET PARKING & VALET PARKING AVAILABLE LOV3 HOUSTON Menu Reservations Events &√Ç¬†VIP Live Entertainment Contact Us About Reservations Get in touch We at LOV3 Houston are always eager to hear from you. Call us if not or if it is urgent Search for: Home About Us Shop Countries Argentina Australia Austria Chile England France Georgia Germany Greece Hungary Italy Lebanon New Zealand Others countries Poland Portugal Slovakia South Africa Spain USA Regions Type Sparkles Dessert Wines Ros√© Red Wine White Wine Organic Non-Alcohollic Grape Variety Our Suggestions Mixed Cases Pick of the week Gourmet Chocolate/Almonds Fish Conserves Olive Oil / Olives Sausages/Salami Wine Box Wine Events Wine Tastings Weddings & Events Gift Card Phisical Gift Voucher Virtual Gift Voucher Contact Us Wishlist My account Home About Us Shop Countries Argentina Australia Austria Chile England France Georgia Germany Greece Hungary Italy Lebanon New Zealand Others countries Poland Portugal Slovakia South Africa Spain USA Regions Type Sparkles Dessert Wines Ros√© Red Wine White Wine Organic Non-Alcohollic Grape Variety Our Suggestions Mixed Cases Pick of the week Gourmet Chocolate/Almonds Fish Conserves Olive Oil / Olives Sausages/Salami Wine Box Wine Events Wine Tastings Weddings & Events Gift Card Phisical Gift Voucher Virtual Gift Voucher Contact Us Wishlist My account Search for: About Us james_f99n87c5 2023-11-03T14:40:54+00:00 Who We Are and What We're About Pinto Wines aims to bring a European, old world feel to Drumcondra Village. Customers will be able to browse for a quality bottle of wine, at a competitive price from a wide selection of regions and grapes not found in your average supermarket or off license. This shop came about when the owner Roger moved to Drumcondra with his family and set about searching for the closest wine shop, only to find that Drumcondra village was lacking on this front. With his many years' experience working in hospitality and restaurants and his passion for wine, he took the plunge and decided to heroically close the gap in that market and here we are! Every bottle of wine that is on offer will have been painstakingly selected and reviewed to ensure that you only buy quality wines at whatever your price range might be. This range and selection will be reflected in our online store. Pinto Wines aims to provide the personal touch, with the proprietor Roger Da Silva available to provide in house guidance, adapting to the customers budget and tastes. We will cater to everyone from the wine lovers and experts to the unacquainted and curious. Follow us Sale!
